name: Rainbow Ride
description:
Description

Rainbow Ride is a 2D platformer where you control a funny Leprechaun. Riding rainbows to jump and move, your goal is to collect back all the gold coins lost in the forest. This game was created during a short Game Jam and is an early prototype that demonstrate the core ideas of a fully developped game, with many more levels and obstacles !

Objective

Reach the end of the level, the "Pot-o-gold", while collecting as many gold coins as possible on the way.

Controls
  • Mouse only :
    • Use the [Right Mouse Button] to roll in a certain direction
    • Hold and release the [Left Mouse Button] to jump in a circle trajectory
    • Click on [Mouse 3] to change the leprechaun's orientation
